title: Beyond the Paper: How I Organize Research Notes
summary: A lightweight system for turning papers into usable ideas and reusable code snippets.

blocks.text: This is the lightweight system I use to turn papers into reusable ideas, experiments, and code.
Notes are only useful when they lead to a decision.

items: Summary: the core claim in a few lines.
Notes: methods, datasets, and red flags.
Actions: experiments or code to try next.

blocks.text: I keep a single markdown template and link it to a project board. Every note ends with a single action, even if it is "do nothing."
